Name: Luis Humberto
description:
Luis Humberto is an indigenous strawberry farmer from Silvia, Cauca. He has more than 30 years of experience in this business. Luis Humberto currently specializes in harvesting strawberry and cabbages that he produces on two hectares of land. As part of his municipalityâ€™s indigenous council, Luis mixes traditional harvesting techniques along with current technologies and processes.

Luis lives with his wife and four children on land that was assigned to him by the local indigenous council. His eldest daughter is currently following in his footsteps and learning how to cultivate using the techniques he learned.

A loan of 1,206,169 COP will help Luis acquire new tools and compost to help him improve his strawberry production.
